website_summaries.verdict: The oxygenated bleach component boosts the power of laundry detergent without the harsh effects of chlorine bleach. We like its versatility and effectiveness as a whitener.
pros: Formulated for multiple cleaning purposes, not limited to laundry
Effective as a pre-treatment or soak
Does not have chlorine bleach odor
cons: Needs to be diluted in HE washers

customer_reviews.title: Great for cleaning brickwork
customer_reviews.text: I used this to clean a brick patio and worked really well! I diluted 8 scoops in 2 gallons of warm water, poured the solution over the brickwork, left for 10 minutes and scrubbed with a stiff brush and a scrubbing brush for stubborn areas.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Hey, I have blue carpet!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put in my carpet steamer (With another clear). It smells great and it works like a charm. I wouldn't trade it for the world. It got the toughest stains out of my carpet. I attached photos showing before / after. This was after one sweep over the carpet. I plan to clean the carpet again in a day or two. Mind you - I live in an old house and the carpet is older than me. I am very impressed with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2 year old and a husband that works outside every evening, so this stuff is amazing to get out stains. You can also use it on white clothes by soaking overnight. It removes underarm stains, diaper blowout stains, etc... I ordered another box and upon opening, discovered that the powder had spilled out into the product box. I opened that box and there are 2 clean cuts into the bag. Disappointed and hopefully will be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have For Your Laundry Room!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! We recently had a new septic system put in. This dang thing has a ton of Don'ts! Don't use anti-bacterial soaps, dont use bleach, dont wash too many loads in one day and so on. It's a pain! I normally use bleach on my whites at least once a week. I was at a loss of what to do. I bought this to use. When I need it I can soak dark colors or light colors in it. I normally soak them for an hour or so. It seems to work well. If it's a bad stain I may rub some on the spot and let it sit. Plus now my white towels smell better!
customer_reviews.author: Taray116

customer_reviews.title: Very effective stain cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for years - I put it into the front loading High Efficiency washer, then put the clothes on top, use regular detergent as recommended, and get great results. It's removed blood, grease, food stains, and coffee stains in cold water from jeans, shirts, and towels without pre-treating and without ever fading the colors. This large size was the best value on Amazon at the time I bought it and is comparable to the price at the big box stores. Smells nice too. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Eclectic Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: this stuff will take out just about anything
customer_reviews.text: From wine to blood, to oil to strawberries (haven't tried beet juice because well, I am skeptical that anything is that strong) . I prefer the Oxi spray to the Oxi powder but Oxi in general removes stains really well and I use it on everything. I will add this to a load of towels or whites as an alternate to bleach. big fan.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Anne Maarten

customer_reviews.title: Really does work on stains
customer_reviews.text: I've seen the commericals for years and thought it was another gimmick. Our dog has been bringing in mud and jumping on our bed right after. Washing with detergent alone didn't remove the stains very well. I washed it with some of this stuff and all of it came out. I couldn't see where the stains previously were. Needless to say, I started doing a bunch of loads of white clothes to get them all whiter!
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Great deal, a little weird to use
customer_reviews.text: I totally recommend this product since it's an amazing deal but it's a little weird to use. It's a giant heavy bag of powder in a cardboard box and you have a little scoop. I was always scared about it spilling and making a giant mess, and I'm in a dorm so I would take a filled scoop with me and my laundry down to the basement. Really it's more than a year's supply though, so I'm still giving it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Not quite as effective as the Baby OxiClean
customer_reviews.text: I bought this large box of Regular OxiClean instead of the baby OxiClean. It was more cost effective. You definitely get more quantity but not the same quality. The Baby OxiClean seems to get out stain better, more gentle on all our clothes as this leaves clothes looking more dull and worn out and the smell is not the same. I would recommend using this only on the item with the stain and not the whole load of clothes. If you want to be able to have extra fresh clean clothes (including getting rid of the natural body odor scent), for the entire load, I would recommend using the Baby OxiClean.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett

customer_reviews.title: This stuff WORKS
customer_reviews.text: I started out using oxyclean just for my clothes. It worked very well, without the need to mix it to make my own detergent to stretch it further. one scoop of oxyclean, smells and stains were out. More recently, I came into contact with a home that needed work. I tried everything, and resolved that the stains in the tub and toilets would remain. I don't know why I decided to try the oxyclean, but it worked exceedingly well. Let it soak overnight, and by morning, a quick pass, as compared to the scrubbing I had earlier done, removed everything. I'm gonna keep this stuff in stock!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Anschuetz

customer_reviews.title: Stains Removed & Bright White Restored
customer_reviews.text: Towards the end of my 14:5 year old dog’s life, she became incontinent when she slept. I was doing laundry everynight washing multiple bed pads. OxiClean and Arm & Hammer Laundry Detergent on a Long Soak Cycle with Warm Water took all stains out of the pads and left them bright white. It was a little thing that made my life easier during a difficult time.
customer_reviews.author: DpB56

customer_reviews.title: NOT color safe!
customer_reviews.text: Be warned: Bleached a whole load! Not color safe at all. Ruined my clothes I am so disappointed! Note- it didn’t bleach everything and some loads had come out previously fine, though most of the time heavy and dark items (like a think black skirt let’s say) would always come out with a white residue / film on it. The last time I used it my whole load was ruined as tons of things had bleach damage and I know it was this product as I don’t have anything else that could have done it.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Suleymanova

customer_reviews.title: For the worst case scenario - OxiClean is the best case solution.
customer_reviews.text: Has saved many a shirt now with an overnight soaking. I heard about it for years from when I was a teenager and even a kid from the late great Billy Mays, and I finally tried it after one of my nicest shirts ended up having a very bad day. I now use this with bedding, with shirts, with pants, with whites, with anything that has a bad stain. So far it has done the trick on most of them. For the really tough ones that even an overnight soak won't fix, I use a toothbrush and make an Oxi-Paste, this seems to do the trick. It is a wonderful product and removed smells in addition to stains.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Black

customer_reviews.title: Oxyclean Versitile cleans many more things than clothes
customer_reviews.text: I use Oxyclean Versitile to clean my deck and siding. I put it in a hose spray bottle ( the one that has water and soap adjustments). I spray the wood deck and furniture with the soap, scrub it a little with brush, and then spay with water. After it dries, everything looks new. I do the same to he siding when it is spotted and it comes clean. I like the fact that it doesn’t hurt any plants if sprayed. When I wash clothes with Oxyclean, they turn out clean and bright and the dingy clothes look whiter I highly recommend Oxyclean Versitile for cleaning most anything.
customer_reviews.author: Flower

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, works like a charm on colors and white
customer_reviews.text: I used this to remove stains on my white shirts and it works like a charm. it's good to pre-soak your highly stained clothes in a solution of this first before washing with other clothes as regular load. Also works to remove stains from my sneaker after getting splashed by colored liquid. This also works on my fitbit bands. If you're using the fabric material for your fitbit band, rather than the rubber one, after some time, because it absorbs your sweat and dirt, it will start to smell, soaking the band in this solution also removed any kind of stains and odors. I'm really happy with this oxiclean and always recommended it to my family and friends
customer_reviews.author: the good neighbor

customer_reviews.title: The bag is crap
customer_reviews.text: I'm not ordering this anymore. It's nice to have this refill but every single time I get one of these delivered, the bag is busted open and there is powder everywhere. Seeping out of the Oxy box and also the delivery box. I'm over it.
customer_reviews.author: Gigglingrizz

customer_reviews.title: New packaging for shipment by amazon
customer_reviews.text: Product- wish they made the No Scent/No dye version in a larger container like this one. But this works great for it's purpose. Works amazing for a pre-soak, stain removing, brightening agent in your laundry. Also use it for cleaning in the house. All around great product. Packaging from Amazon- much better! It came in a sealed plastic bag and it's own box this time which while I hate the idea of more plastic/materials etc.. it did help seal the box and prevent any mishaps in shipping.
customer_reviews.author: pink7

customer_reviews.title: Tougher than dirt
customer_reviews.text: I think there was an ad that used to say, "Stronger than dirt." That's this stuff (although the ad was for another product - Ajax, I think.) Whenever I have some really tough stains or grease (I do a lot of mechanical and contracting work) I put this in a plate or bowl and mix it with either dish or laundry detergent to make a paste and apply it directly to the area. Best stuff I've ever used without damaging fabric, etc. Also add it to laundry if the clothes are especially dirty - I generally use a detergent that already has this in it, so I don't add more, typically.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Best Laundry Helper
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Oxyclean for years and the original formula is still my favorite. It works with everything and gets out stubborn stains & smells without issues. My only complaint is this big box package. It's hard to open and the plastic bag inside isn't resealable. You're supposed to keep the powder air tight for freshness. The small containers have a plastic lid to seal it. If they made this easier to open and a zipper pouch inside it would be very much appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: a2010

customer_reviews.title: Huge Difference
customer_reviews.text: i feel like this helps get the clothes cleaner and now they smell clean ( i don't believe there is a scent with this but the scent from the detergent last longer now that the clothes are cleaner) There is no resealable bag so can get messy, i transferred mine to a container to keep fresh and easy to access and use
customer_reviews.author: Lj

customer_reviews.title: I was unable to find a better price anywhere else
customer_reviews.text: I use OxiClean to make homemade laundry detergent. Adding OxiClean to the mix enhances how well the home made mix cleans clothing. Additionally, I was unable to find a better price anywhere else. Great product/value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Oxiclean for 20 years. When my kids were little, it was the ONLY way to get stains out of their clothes, especially fruit stains. I tried everything to get rid of it but only OxiClean could get it out. Soak in warm water and Oxiclean for a while and then wash regularly. Stains are gone! I have an HE washer and I am on a septic tank and this is safe for both. I never wash without adding a scoop of OxiClean to my wash. The clothes come out cleaner and fresher than without.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Safer, septic safe, Bio clean safe alternative to bleach
customer_reviews.text: While not as powerful as bleach, Oxiclean, which basically forms hydrogen peroxide, is a much gentler product for the environment and for you. Indeed, when you consider the alternative products (e.g. bleach, powerful but probably carcinogenic according to current studies), finding a safer whitener/cleaner/disinfectant is important. I like using this product as I also use Bio Clean gel on my drains, and as a septic safe product, this theoretically shouldn't kill the "good" bacteria that Bio Clean adds to my drains.
customer_reviews.author: B. Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Product may be delivered open!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a good value and oxi clean is oxi clean! The packaging was very good from the outside however when opened the plastic container top had come loose and half my oxide clean was laying outside the container! Simple situation to handle as box was tightly sealed and I lost little if any of the granular product. My suggestion to whomever is to wrap trap around the product or seal shut so this does not happen again!
customer_reviews.author: ExecMan

customer_reviews.title: Cuts all the smells out
customer_reviews.text: Takes the smell out of even the worst of stinks. Highly recommend, especially if you have a family member who works around harsh smells or is just extra tough on sweat with their clothing. Doesnt leave any fragrance. I pair about 2 TBSP of this along with my regular detergent for smelly laundry and it works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Birdie

customer_reviews.title: Best stain remover!
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my whites all the time, it is awesome. We work outside all summer long and our white socks get very dirty. When washing our socks, they always came out a dingy white, now I take them (& some other whites) and soak the in oxiclean & water for a few hours prior to washing them. Now when they come out of the washer the are as white as the day I took them out of their new packaging. Also as a bonus, I usually soak them in my kitchen sink - when I drain the oxiclean & water mixture from my stainless steel sink, it shines like you polished it. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: James J.

customer_reviews.title: when did the packaging shrink ?
customer_reviews.text: it is always a good thing to remember history... and reference it! packaging shrinking price hovering close to historic..... for way less product. I personally NEVER want a SCENT. I rinse multiple times and keep it in a very tightly closed container so it doesn't poison the air in my house. When I need to get stains out I soak overnight. (not very often...) Would rather be stained than "scented"
customer_reviews.author: Na

customer_reviews.title: Gets Out The Blood
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it works on all stains but blood is the worst in my opinion. Now, don’t get me wrong- I‘m not a murderer, but I have a husband that scratches himself while he sleeps, causing the skin to break resulting in blood loss. Soaking the sheets in OxyClean will bring my expensive king sheets back to new which saves the day (and marriage). It is a great product and well worth 5 stars to keep the forensic guys out of my life.
customer_reviews.author: Nomadic Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly effective!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an addition to our regular detergent since we live in an apartment with coined-operated washer and dryer. I am shocked how well this product assists in deep cleaning, brightening and breaking down stains! My husband is a construction manager and a potter, I work in healthcare and I finally feel like our laundry is legit clean and fresh smelling. Though this product itself doesn't have a scent it helps breakdown and eliminate stains and dirt that are causing lingering odor. This should be a household staple. Absolutely no issues with it dissolving.
customer_reviews.author: kendall dowler

customer_reviews.title: Best whitener ever
customer_reviews.text: I researched whiteners and I was referred to this product from PBS and a top rated spot and stain remover. I put this in my front load for a 9-hour wash, yes 9 hours. It soaks throughout the night and in the morning, all blood, tea, and even blackberry stains came out of my Frette linens. I thought they were ruined forever. No more bleach, as I hate the smell. I also now use the regular OxiClean for my darks and wash them for 9 hours as well. No pretreating needed either. An amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: michael j moore

customer_reviews.title: grime out
customer_reviews.text: The 2 main reasons I use this are: Care for a paraplegic and I work intensely outside and in. My husband's clothing get incredibly dirty because he drops or spills food and drink over his shirt and pants. My clothing gets incredibly dirty from lawn car, digging, planting, building, repairing, cooking, painting, etc. With oxiclean I know I can get our cloths clean, my whites white, my colors vivid and we are fresh and ready for another time. Thanks and yes I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: teresa48

customer_reviews.title: Revives white t-shirts!
customer_reviews.text: I had a few old white t-shirts that were in good condition with the exception of some pretty obvious underarm stains (due to aluminum-based antiperspirant). A few sites suggested this stuff to fix them. I was pretty skeptical at first, but after an overnight soak & hot wash, I'm quite impressed! The stains have been reduced by about 70-80%. Not -perfect-, but nearly invisible & I can actually wear these shirts again. To remove underarm stains: Pour some hot water in a bucket, add a half scoop's worth, let shirt soak overnight. In the morning, wash with hot water, a half scoop, and detergent. Truly great stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Extremely happy with Oxy- clean. Life time customer here
customer_reviews.text: So ive been having problems with laundry detergents not only leaving my clothes still feeling and smelling weird after i wash them as well as not producing suds even with 3 cups of detergent so i figured id give this a try.I used 1 scoop full and this stuff worked wonders especially on a white wash cloth that had been used for just about anything i can think of.Oxi now has a loyal customer in me.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Removes baby poo stains and shower walls discoloration
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It is great for removing stains like the stubborn yellow baby poo stains. Just soak the garment in warm water with oxyclean. It's good for removing stains, discolora, built up in an old shower. Just make a paste with oxiclean and water, rub it in to shower walls and let it sit. Then come back and scrub it with a brush. Repeat if needed. It took off discoloration off my 1970s shower.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great product for laundry
customer_reviews.text: I like using Oxiclean for my laundry- instead of bleach and harsh chemicals. It foams up when exposed to water; hence it’s name. I also use it on my delicates, which I soak, as well as in a HE washing machine. My only concern/issue is that the plastic bag was slashed. The shipping and product box were both intact; it was just the internal plastic bag had three slashes. I’m not sure how much product I lost, I’m sure it wasn’t too much.
customer_reviews.author: ItalianHomeChef

customer_reviews.title: Must have in the laundry room
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner is great as a paste in the bathroom if you have real tiles that need to be cleaned as well as in the laundry room. I use the liquid spray for predetergent and mix in the powder in my loads of laundry, all stains are removed every time, use hot water for the best results especially in soiled clothes when you have breast feed newborn baby, their poop i neon green or yellow depending on what momma eats. Must have it has saved my kids white, stained socks and clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Eliza

customer_reviews.title: Gets soiled stains out of my baby’s clothes
customer_reviews.text: So glad I started using this. This does wonders on my baby’s clothing. I’m sure many of his items would be ruined without this product. I normally wash clothes once a week. I prepared a small bucket with water and a scoop of oxy powder and then add his clothes to it as they become messy. At the end of the week I take all of the clothes out and wash with his other non messy clothes and they always turn out like new. Even the whites turn out white!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. For Thanksgiving we had curried goat (Jamaica dish) if you know anything about curry it stains really bad and nothing gets it out... my husband washed the tablecloth and the napkins which were cream and said you have to throw them away they are ruined. I said let me try the oxyclean first and boy oh boy this did exactly what I hoped it would!! Can’t say enough about this product!
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: This thing is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I had a bunch of expensive button down office shirts that I was hesitant to through out due to discoloration in the pits area only. I've tried a ton of different things to get rid of the issue and nothing worked untill now. I saved so much money by saving the shirts I liked. I honestly did not even expect it to work due to so many tries and kind of still don't believe it worked. Definitely required working overnight!
customer_reviews.author: Reda

customer_reviews.title: Must have for stubborn stains
customer_reviews.text: This formula of Oxy combined with Biz will remove most of any stains. I like using them in the combination as Oxy is brilliant in using peroxide's cleaning power and biz has very powerful enzymes. I do have to make sure to rinse extra cycle to ensure I do not get skin reaction. My skin tends to be sensitive. I have no problem with this powerful laundry booster so long as I make sure to thoroughly rinse them out, .
customer_reviews.author: Tyco

customer_reviews.title: Useless -
customer_reviews.text: Used a couple of times - colors fade and stains don't come off
customer_reviews.author: Sana

customer_reviews.title: Can't imagine it's clean without OxiClean
customer_reviews.text: Save a lot of money buying this on here. It is also slightly larger than the size I usually find in the grocery store. One of the few benefits of Amazon Prime. The product itself works great. I know whenever I use this stuff and when I don't the clothes really do come out cleaner. I haven't used it as a stain remover so much as for a laundry booster. I have paired it with Era (which I also purchased from here) and the combo does a great job at removing some set-in stains and my general slobbish drips and drops.
customer_reviews.author: Starcrescendo

customer_reviews.title: This is scented HORRIBLE, STRONG scent!
customer_reviews.text: The scent is HORRIBLE!!! I made a huge mistake buying this as I didn't realize it was scented. Why the manf. thought a scent would be a good idea completely baffles me. So unnecessary. BTW the unscented is more expensive because it costs LESS to not add perfumes they charge MORE...why?
customer_reviews.author: Tachigirl

customer_reviews.title: Great product and price - do not purchase with other items
customer_reviews.text: Three stars due to repeated packaging issues with the large cardboard version when lump shipped with other amazon purchases. Due to the product's significant weight, it gets jostled around quite a bit in the larger boxes. I have yet to receive one intact unless shipped solo... and spilled OxyClean all over an entire box worth of purchases is no joy. For what it's worth, the smaller plastic tubs seem to arrive just fine.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Horrible packaging!!!
customer_reviews.text: I give this product such a low rating bc it literally exploded BOTH times I ordered it. It was wrapped in two bags both obviously cut by accident, but even so I lost a lot of product to the floor upon opening the package to transfer to a usable container. It’s still cheaper to order here then buy at the store, just prepare yourself for a mess and have another container to put product in.
customer_reviews.author: Autism mom

customer_reviews.title: works ok for me but better use for my bathroom non porous surfaces
customer_reviews.text: oxiclean, for me is just OK to use on regular washes but not for challenging stains. For the HE washer i must mix with water prior to the load and put in the wash to avoid any color loss. plus it doesn't dissolve easily and leaves my clothes with a residue.. instead i am using in my bathrooms for cleaning non porous surfaces and it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Reality tourist

customer_reviews.title: Laundry additive that this cheapskate still uses.
customer_reviews.text: Used on my chef coats, their logos and embroideries have not faded yet, nor bled out onto surrounding fabric, but the tomatoes and blood and kitchen goo has come out (still dealing with some carbon and pan stains). Doesn't clump into a solid ball in this south eastern, marshy air. Doesn't cause ME to breakout or itch when used, on either end, scooping and wearing of clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: then washing in cold does a good job. Wife noticed improvement in smell on towels ...
customer_reviews.text: I've long been a believer in this as a laundry additive. I don't add nearly as much as their scoop would suggest (I use a smaller scoop that came with a box years ago). I have found that adding this with some warm water, then washing in cold does a good job. Wife noticed improvement in smell on towels (i.e. 'they don't smell anymore' which clearly is an improvement). I'm using a front-loading HE washer and now add a small scoop to every load. Have also used it to help clean other things such as plastic lawn chairs with mixed results. Mix a solution in warm water and soak things in it seems to be most effective.
customer_reviews.author: Erik --

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive here
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on a lightning deal- still not a good value. I typically purchase at a warehouse store- and will continue to do so. For a little more, you get a much larger box. It was nice to have it delivered to my door. The product itself is wonderful and works great. We use it primarily for my husbands uniforms which get very dirty, but know from experience that it also works well to remove pet urine stains and smell.
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: A must for us but only ONE flaw...
customer_reviews.text: So we use oxiclean religiously in our home, and I still have the same issue: PLEASE DO SOMETHING TO MAKE THE BAG THAT HOLDS THE OXI EASIER TO OPEN/CLOSE. Is there anyway to put a zipper closer on the internal bag to make sure I don't mutilate the dang thing and have to clean up oxiclean all over my floor? Please?!
customer_reviews.author: Three Little Kittens

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive versatile stain remover
customer_reviews.text: This is a great inexpensive versatile product to keep in your home. You can use it for many purposes, not just for removing stains from laundry, but this is good for general household cleaning as well. Amazon ships it in a sealed plastic bag so there is minimal spill. Overall this is a great product to have.
customer_reviews.author: DSoh

customer_reviews.title: Great price great product makes clothes look almost new again
customer_reviews.text: I normally buy this from the Dollar General close to my house. It's a much smaller container and for the size really costly so after seeing this on Amazon I had to buy it. Really good deal and gets delivered right to my front door. That being said it works wonders on whites. I always soak my whites 1st before washing and they come out so gleaming white. It works great for colors also, gets stains out and makes the colors brighter. I have a teenage son. Need all the help I can get......
customer_reviews.author: Gwenpenn

customer_reviews.title: Works great, Not as natural as it seems
customer_reviews.text: This works better than bleach or any cleaning product I've used for laundry. Soak in hot water and Oxyclean and it will take any stains out. However, it has a strong fragrance and doesn't seem as natural as it comes off. The larger size is also perfect but it comes at the cost of not being in a reusable tub. Opening and using the bag is messy.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy T

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a stain remover in my laundry, on carpets/rugs, & also put in my warm water when I wash the walls in the house. Helps get some of the grime off of vehicles without harming the finish.
customer_reviews.author: PVH

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!! I buy it all the time
customer_reviews.text: I looove oxiclean!!! My white sheet got soiled and I washed them once and forgot oxiclean so when I pulled it out, it had a huge stain on it. So I put I back in the washer and added the oxiclean powder, and also put it right on the stain and let it wash a second time. When I pulled it out the stain was pretty much gone! I know it will be completely gone after the next wash
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Isam

customer_reviews.title: For use in my washer ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this product in my washing machine to help boost cleaning for my towels and clothes. It helped remove excessive colored chalk that my kids had all over their clothing and shoes from a color battle at school. I really should find other uses for it but so far this is all I use it for. I will continue to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: DLS

customer_reviews.title: So ive been having problems with laundry detergents not only ...
customer_reviews.text: So ive been having problems with laundry detergents not only leaving my clothes still feeling and smelling weird after i wash them as well as not producing suds even with 3 cups of detergent so i figured id give this a try.I used 1 scoop full and this stuff worked wonders especially on a white wash cloth that had been used for just about anything i can think of.Oxi now has a loyal customer in me.I thought it was bogus because of the infomercials but i see they were not kidding!
customer_reviews.author: Orochimaru Sama

customer_reviews.title: Brightens!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a neatnik so I transfer one third of the bulk box to an Oxyclean plastic container that is easy to manage with one hand. Oxyclean gets out everything and truly brightens my clothes. A paste of oxyclean and Zout will get out even tomato based stains and stains that have gone through the dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy Duck

customer_reviews.title: Works Well!
customer_reviews.text: My work shirts are a pure white and were starting to turn grayish and accumulate stains. No matter how many times I washed them they still looked gross. I washed them twice in a row and only soaked them for 20 minutes before washing and they already look almost new again.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Shipping department does not know how secure iitem.
customer_reviews.text: Cap was off container and over half of it was spilled into box.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Co-Wallis

customer_reviews.title: It worked for me
customer_reviews.text: I used a strong solution to soak a stubborn stain on a white sweater sleeve. It took some doing and repeated hand scrubbing by hand but I got it out. None of the other commonly used products I tried worked. Glad I tried it and I continue to use it for seemingly impossible stains.
customer_reviews.author: RudysMom

customer_reviews.title: A laundry staple at our house
customer_reviews.text: I rarely wash clothes without Oxiclean anymore. We had problems with our clothes not fully coming cleanin our washer, plus my husband works oilfield and we have a cattle ranch. Oxiclean takes care of all of the nasty stuff he manages to drag in on his clothes, and it keeps our regular clothes looking nice and fresh also. We seriously couldn’t go without it. I tried for a few loads and immediately regretted it and bought some more.
customer_reviews.author: MrsO

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I use this product in my kids clothes and i couldn't be happier with the outcome! I have three boys so you can assume with them always playing outside there clothes tend to get a bit messy and oxi clean will leave there clothes 99% stain free after every wash!! Also this is an amazing deal, you actually get a lot of oxi clean for this super low price, it comes packaged really well also! All around awesome products, awesome packaging and awesome price!!! Would recommend 110%
customer_reviews.author: Alison Napier

customer_reviews.title: No scoop
customer_reviews.text: Bought new white sheets and figured this will keep them whiter. No scoop with my box -- and I transferred it to a different container, so I know it's not just buried. The answered questions here helped me out to know how to use a measuring cup, but then I had to buy a new measuring cup set to use just with this. The packaging is not great, so I also bought a container to store it. I'm sure it will clean well, as there are so many good reviews, but the extra effort I needed just to get to the point of using it was annoying.
customer_reviews.author: NYC Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Oxyclean works! Thier packaging engineers apparently don't!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. Works great if you follow instructions. HOWEVER - This double volume box appears to be the size and volume of 2 standard "tub"s of product, but is actually a BAG of product inside a thin paperboard box. As you can expect, shipping this means it leaks everywhere and the SINGLE calibrated scoop is shattered ALWAYS. This was one item among others in my amazon prime box, and the leaked oxyclean crystals were EVERYWHERE including in some electronics that were shipped in the same order. I bought this size to save a bit of money over buying two individual tubs, and that was a regrettable decision.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart D.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I always use it as an addition to my regular detergent and is great. My daughter uses white shirts for school. I soak the shirts for twenty minutes in water with OxiClean and then put these on the washing machine with my regular detergent and they came out great.
customer_reviews.author: Matos' Metal

customer_reviews.title: Not prime compatable
customer_reviews.text: As a laundry soap it works great. The problem was it leaked everywhere. I did the first load of laundry with the soap that was in the prime box and the Oxi box without cutting open the bag. It was a total mess. I will not be purchasing this again from Prime.
customer_reviews.author: Massey

customer_reviews.title: OxiClean
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper by the metric ton. Cost per ounce isn't bad. You have to allow sufficient shelf space. It can be bulky to use. You might consider refilling from the box to an empty plastic tub. If this beats your current purchase cost, then go for it
customer_reviews.author: Gadget-Guy

customer_reviews.title: Removes stains from white t-shirts
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is simply the best for whitening clothes. Better than bleach because it doesn’t yellow your clothes the way bleach can and it gets stains out that bleach does not. Later white t-shirt put stains! Supposedly you can use this to clean other stuff too. I tried it to clean tile grout (there’s a vid on YouTube). Didn’t work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Julianna

customer_reviews.title: Got my old stains out and left my bathtub grout looking fresh
customer_reviews.text: The space in my apartment is very limited, I didn’t realize the size of the box or the length that I would have to soak items- the only option was to soak them in the bathtub overnight. That being said, it got the stains out of things that I had no hope left for and cleaned the grout in my bathroom.... bonus!
customer_reviews.author: IDontWantToGoToTheStore

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware when I purchased this product I was so happy until I open the box and the bag was broken and inside the box all of the Oxi clean was out of it the box was damaged I’m unhappy about this! And to add to that I had to use another product to store it very upset!!! Overall the product is great and would buy again but with better packaging!!!
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: Great product poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: I love oxyclean. It can be used on clothing and rugs. It never has disappointed. This packaging was frustrating as the bag inside the box was opened on the bottom. I contacted the seller who said they would send a new box after I sent this back. I didn't want to go through the trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Robin O.

customer_reviews.title: Removed a Giant Grease Stain with Ease
customer_reviews.text: I spilled a candle on myself wearing my favorite shirt and everyone told me it was ruined, but I read some cleaning blogs that said to try Oxiclean. I'm glad I did; with a combination of baking soda, dish soap, and a whole lot of Oxiclean, my shirt is like new and you'd never guess I had a grease stain across the front of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: So this is a good product, doesn't turn your whites yellow. I don't use as much as your supposed to. The scent is good but strong. When you open it up, scoop it, pour into the washer make sure you don't breath any in on accident.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Not buying again
customer_reviews.text: Not purchasing again !! Didn’t work first off and second it came hard as a rock I basically had to beat it and that still didn’t work I always placed in the bottom of my washer as water is running and it just clumps you ... I’ll stick to sprays
customer_reviews.author: Momof2boys

customer_reviews.title: Pretty big mess when I brought the box into the ...
customer_reviews.text: Container came open in box. Pretty big mess when I brought the box into the house. Think I will stick to buying this at the local grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Ogburn

customer_reviews.title: Package broken and soap everywhere!
customer_reviews.text: The box the product came in was not punctured however the contents of the soap were everywhere in the box due to the plastic shards of what remained of the scooper. The chore of cleaning has been served to me two-fold.
customer_reviews.author: Sara C.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value. It does what it says it will do.
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it really helps me to get stains out of my laundry! I liked that it did what it says it will do for your laundry. I can use it and know that I am doing the best I can for my laundry. It's amazing how it works on dingy laundry.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Gray

customer_reviews.title: A Mess!
customer_reviews.text: The box looks like it had been dropped on a corner at the bottom as a large hole was made. There was powder all over, so any savings from ordering on-line was lost (Not to mention a pain to clean up!)
customer_reviews.author: Cindy M.Top Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Fresh and Powerful
customer_reviews.text: Oxiclean does what it says it does. Used on a stain I missed on a blouse I had not worn over a month ago and stain came out. Laundry was brighter and fresh. I must say this product works well on other things, ranging from carpet to household cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: An excellent product, it does exactly what it says . . .
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value. I have been very satisfied with the results using this product. Read the directions, it targets stains, but some may need a concentrated application. I do recommend this laundry additive. I subscribe to this product.
customer_reviews.author: Grant H.

customer_reviews.title: Best stain remover!
customer_reviews.text: This a a great product at a terrific price. My husband bleeds a lot. A scoop in the washer on the prewash cycle and every stain comes out - every time!
customer_reviews.author: Em's

customer_reviews.title: great for soaking off stains
customer_reviews.text: contrary to the TV advertisements, not all stains come off in the wash.....like hair color on old t-shirts..especially if you have hard water. I place my old t-shirts and stained dish cloths in a large bowl with enough water to cover them and a couple scoops of Oxiclean and let them soak for a couple days. The hair color comes out and most stains on the dish cloths come out as well. I then throw them in the wash machine and wash as I normally would. I also use this in every load of clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Poppie

customer_reviews.title: Great Laundry Additive
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and have been using it for a long time. It really works well with laundry detergent and leaves clothes smelling fresher. I added this to my subscribe and save. I’d recommend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Why do I even...

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Real deal
customer_reviews.text: Love this product and the large box will last a while. I poured it into my old oxi plastic container. There’s still a lot left in the box so once the container is empty I’ll refill it. I’ll buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Gets all Stains out Without Bleach!
customer_reviews.text: I am an HUGE messy eater! I get ketchup and red sauce stains on my clothes way too often. Umm.. red wine spills mostly.. lol And I don’t do Clorox on my clothes.. most of my clothes are dark and/or colored. Only with oxyclean + detergent, I ALWAYS get ALL and EVERY stains out! For stubborn stains, Pre-soak for few hours, before putting in the wash!
customer_reviews.author: JoeyGirl

customer_reviews.title: wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Takes the stains out of clothes. Works well as home cleaning product too. I use this to clean my stainless sinks, get the hot oil grease off back-splash, get stains out of my rug. I even mix a scoop full of oxi with bucket of hot water and wipe down all my white doors, frames, and baseboards. Makes them gleam so white again. So many things you can use this product on.. its wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: at best. Soaked it on its side in a bath ...
customer_reviews.text: What CAN'T you clean with this?! We took out the kitchen hood fan after 30 years, only to find it encrusted in a coating of grease - a daunting task, at best. Soaked it on its side in a bath of Oxiclean and hot water, and the disgusting crud just FELL OFF - it now runs like a top, just like new. Unreal- this is how you get yard sale stuff looking like new again. It's magic.
customer_reviews.author: The Fairydogmother

customer_reviews.title: Zero fragrance
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this exact product for years & loved how fresh it made my clothes smell, unfortunately, this box came with ZERO fragrance. I didn't purchase fragrance-free. It's as if this last shipment was mislabeled.
customer_reviews.author: Am@zon Love Affair

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Magical
customer_reviews.text: Originally a skeptic of Oxi-Clean, now a true believer. Had shirts with stains that had long since set and sweat marks from my deodorant's aluminium setting--I was ready to toss the shirts away. After reading a few reviews online, decided to take my chances; after soaking my shirts for just over 24 hours in lukewarm water + Oxi-clean (1 scoop/10 qt bucket) and throwing them in the wash, the stains and yellowing had completely disappeared. Swear by it, absolute life saver.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan G

customer_reviews.title: BEST Stain Remover on the Market!
customer_reviews.text: Best product on the market! I love vintage embroidered pillowcases and when I find them in a thrift shop, they always have a yellow tinge to them. I soak the vintage pillowcases for several days in water and OxiClean and they come out whiter than white without affecting the embroidery thread. I rate OxiClean with an A+++!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Eh, It's ok
customer_reviews.text: I'm not impressed. I've seen no difference compared to using luke warm to hot water alone while soaking laundry. OK on carpets, but baking soda strangely preforms better.. 3 stars for at least being a good cleaning agent in a spray bottle. Otherwise it's a 7 pound box taking up space in my bathroom's cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: J. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for so many things!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Amazing cleaning power for things I couldn’t even dream of! However, don’t mix this with Lysol laundry sanitizer. It creates a strong ammonia smell that’s hard to get rid of. Amazing on dog pee stains on the carpet. Even used it in our carpet cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Josh and Carissa K.

customer_reviews.title: Bright clean clothes
customer_reviews.text: Useful to use with liquid detergent or pod detergent. Clothes seem to come out brighter and cleaner - workout clothes in particular come out odor-free, which is a huge bonus. Also for useful for other cleaning in the kitchen and bathroom when diluted or mixed into a paste.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Lee

customer_reviews.title: Does not work for me
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why my experience has been so different of that of many other reviewers, but this stuff just doesn't work for me. I have carefully followed the instructions on the package and I see no results. Even after soaking my white clothes for 6 hours in an OxiClean solution, and then washing them, results are inferior to simply using soap and a brush.
customer_reviews.author: Marlo F.

customer_reviews.title: Billy Mays was right!!
customer_reviews.text: Best thing since sliced bread. I use it on my blood soaked Jiu Jitsu gi and it comes out everytime. Best part is you just leave it in over night and you can see the dirt in the water. We also use this on our kids clothes and boom cleans 9-10 strains.
customer_reviews.author: Bradly G.

customer_reviews.title: I love this product.
customer_reviews.text: Cant speak highly enough of this product. I love it. Works wonders. I have had to recently start doing my own laundry and thought it was easy to get whites clean. And I was wrong. Once I took some advice from friends who knew what they were talking about I realized this product is invaluable getting clothes clean. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Enzweiler

customer_reviews.title: no longer need multiple cleaning products
customer_reviews.text: At first I was skeptical but using this product has been great. Just remember if you use this in the wash with your favorite detergent use a little less of your detergent. Did a great job in the wash and the best part is that its versatile! so I dont need to buy a bunch of different cleaners to clean my home, I just need this box. Also helps if you have small children that sometimes have night time accidents, cleans the mattress and helps with the odor.
customer_reviews.author: MidLife Introvert

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed with this item
customer_reviews.text: When I receive the box it was crashed, ripped opened, full of its content, looked like it had gotten wet some time in the past. If it was on a shelf in a store nobody would have bought it. The bag inside had a very small pin hole inside. I needed it so I am using it, plus we are not leaving the house much due to the situation right now. Thank You for your time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Price for Oxi Clean
customer_reviews.text: When I first used Oxi Clean, I thought it didn't do a thing. However, one night my grandson spilled something ( can't remember - years ago) on his new white polo shirt. I decided to soak it overnight in Oxi Clean. Wow, it was spotless, the next morning. This is how I use it now, I soak my clothes or linens in the washing machine over night. The price here on Amazon is great.
customer_reviews.author: Sanda dominy

product_meta.title: OxiClean Versatile Stain Remover Powder, 7.22 lbs.
product_meta.description: Size:7.22 Pound (Pack of 1)Life can get messy-but who wants to spend all day scrubbing dirt and stains? Luckily, OxiClean Versatile Stain Remover is the answer to almost every stain-fighting need you have-in laundry, and beyond! When used as directed, its oxygen-based water-activated formula safely gets tough dirt and grime out of clothes, carpets and nearly any surface in your home. OxiClean Versatile Stain Remover Powder harnesses the power of oxygen to get out tough dirt, persistent spots and set-in stains. It’s the answer to almost every stain-fighting need you have. Presoak your laundry to loosen and eradicate stains. In the washer, OxiClean Versatile Stain Remover works with your regular detergent to get your clothes extra clean – just pour it into the drum. It comes in handy for carpets, upholstery and nearly any surface in your home. It’s chlorine-free and color safe. OxiClean offers a wide array of products to fit all your stain removal needs. The OxiClean family has grown to include stain removers, pretreaters, laundry detergent, and much more!
feature_bullets: One 7.22 lb (115.3 Ounce) box of OxiClean Versatile Stain Remover Powder
Oxygen-based, water-activated formula gets out tough dirt, persistent spots and set-in stains
Works with regular detergent to get clothes extra clean
Works on carpets, upholstery and nearly any surface in your home

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
